description: Lowepro transforms the classic black digital case into a slim and modern design with the Volta 20. It’s an ideal carrying solution for consumers who like a lean and subtle option for their compact cameras, smartphones and MP3 players. The Volta 20 is crafted of molded EVA foam to protect contents from bumps and scratches. An interior slip pocket stores a battery or memory card. The integrated belt loop provides an additional carrying option. Volta 20 has a streamlined shape that tucks away neatly in a pocket, backpack, briefcase, handbag or tote. Perfect protection without the bulk for a man or woman with modern sensibilities.
title: Lowepro Volta 20 Camera Case (Black)
